name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in leveraging **Python**, **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow** to build and optimize machine learning models. My technical skills also include cloud services such as **Azure** and infrastructure management using **Terraform**. I have a proven track record of developing and deploying APIs, managing **NoSQL** databases, and implementing **CI/CD** processes with **Docker**, which is crucial for delivering scalable ML solutions.

I have a strong background in integrating predictive analytics and intelligent automation within enterprise applications, especially in sectors like healthcare and finance. My expertise in machine learning encompasses developing and operationalizing pipelines as well as tackling challenges in areas like **NLP**, **image processing**, and handling large language models (**LLMs**). Excellent communication and collaboration skills further enable me to work effectively within cross-functional teams while demonstrating adaptability and strong problem-solving abilities.
